# CrosbieLabFunctions

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of CrosbieLabFunctions is to create a host of functions that will be used repetitively in the Crosbie

## Installation

You can install the development version of CrosbieLabFunctions from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` {r, eval = FALSE}
### Use Pak
#install.packages('pak')
pak::pkg_install("jclutton/CrosbieLabFunctions")


### Use Devtools
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github('jclutton/CrosbieLabFunctions')
```
